text: Year 38 BC was either a common year starting on Sunday or Monday or a leap year starting on Saturday, Sunday or Monday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Pulcher and Flaccus. 38 BC was year 1 of the Spanish era calendar that was used in Hispania until the 15th century. ==Events== * Octavian Caesar marries Livia. She is still pregnant from a recent marriage. * Octavian appoints Marcus Vipsanius Agrippa governor of Transalpine Gaul * Parthia invades Syria == Births == * Nero Claudius Drusus (d. 9 BC) == Deaths == * Orodes II of Parthia * Pacorus, crownprince of Parthia Category:30s BC
title: 38 BC
